body:
The CNL OS previously used the *Cray PE* version to determine the OS version.  Cray does not synchronize PE and CLE releases; you can run CLE7 with PrgEnv 6 (and NERSC currently does).
                                                                                                                                                                               
- [x] Fix Spack's OS detection by using the cle-release file to detect the OS version.  This file is updated with every CLE OS release.
title: cray: use the cle-release file to determine CNL version
